meanings.definition: Seigniories: the territories or estates of a seignior or lord
meanings.sent1: The seigniories of the noble lord stretched far and wide across the land.
meanings.sent2: The seigniories were passed down through generations in the noble family.
meanings.sent3: The seigniories of the lord were so vast that even the birds needed maps to navigate.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and generosity were the seigniories that ruled over the hearts of the villagers.
meanings.sent5: The seigniories stood proudly, like guardians of the ancient realm.
